title: Comparative Study of Face-to-Face Learning vs. Synchronous Online Learning Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment, requiring discussion-centered interactive design. Provides continuous learning feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze differences in discussion types between face-to-face and synchronous online learning environments
Learners can systematically categorize discussion records using content analysis methods
Learners can measure perception differences toward online learning through survey design
Learners can propose instructional design strategies to facilitate in-depth discussions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
